provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In this Act-                                                     Interprets-

    “rum” has the same meaning assigned to that expres-
        sion by the Excise Duty Act;
    “ether content” means the number of grams of total
        esters, calculated as ethyl acetate, in every hun-
        dred litres of absolute ethyl alcohol contained in
        rum at a temperature of sixty degrees by Fahren-
        heit’s thermometer.

provisions.content:

the force and effect of law.
